articles.description: Al-Hilal sign Uruguay striker Darwin Nunez from Premier League champions Liverpool in a deal worth £46.3m.
articles.title: Darwin Nunez transfer: Liverpool striker joins Saudi Pro League team Al-Hilal

articles.description: Eddie Howe says "everything is in play" with Alexander Isak - but the Newcastle manager needs players that "really want to play" for the club.
articles.title: Alexander Isak future: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe still unsure on future

articles.description: Slovenia striker Benjamin Sesko becomes Manchester United's third major signing in attack this summer transfer window.
articles.title: Benjamin Sesko: Manchester United sign striker in five-year deal worth £73.7m

articles.description: NBA legend LeBron James is among those to praise Shedeur Sanders after the rookie quarterback's first pre-season game for the Cleveland Browns.
articles.title: Shedeur Sanders: LeBron James hails NFL rookie after first pre-season game

articles.description: England's forward supremacy tells as they power to victory away to France in their final warm-up match before the 2025 Women's Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: France 6-40 England: Red Roses dominate maul to win final World Cup warm-up

articles.description: Mohamed Salah calls out Uefa over a tribute to Palestinian footballer Suleiman al-Obeid it posted on social media which failed to refer to the circumstances surrounding his death.
articles.title: Suleiman al-Obeid: Mohamed Salah calls out Uefa over tribute

articles.description: Emma Raducanu brushes aside Olga Danilovic at the Cincinnati Open to make a confident start with her new coach.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Emma Raducanu wins first match with new coach as Jannik Sinner and Iga Swiatek also win

articles.description: David de Gea describes his return to Old Trafford in Saturday's friendly between Manchester United and Fiorentina as "emotional".
articles.title: David de Gea enjoys Man Utd return for Fiorentina in friendly

articles.description: Japanese boxer Shigetoshi Kotari, 28, dies on Friday from injuries sustained during his bout with Yamato Hata on 2 August.
articles.title: Boxing: Japenese boxer Shigetoshi Kotari, 28, dies from injuries in fight in Tokyo

articles.description: Tommy Fleetwood takes a one-stroke lead into the final day of the St Jude Championship in Memphis after overcoming early third-round struggles.
articles.title: St Jude Championship: Tommy Fleetwood leads Justin Rose by one shot after third round
